sentences.sContent: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.sCn: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

phrases.pCn: n. 蜣螂；金龟子科；甲虫

trans.tranOther: solid waste from animals, especially cows
